replies.body: {{champion:78}}  Ranged harass with her buckler auto attack. And her W denies his leap with a big "NOPE". Plus, Rengar wants to get in bushes, and bushes are set up by walls, allowing Poppy the chance for an easy wall stun.

He's a cat. Natural enemies of cats are dogs, water, and wiggly string things. Try Nasus, Fizz, or Illaoi.


Or, you know, Fiora/Renekton probably do the job.
I thought Rengar countered Nasus top due to his slow, traps, and constant harass from brush.
Nasus can just rush ibg or frozen heart and ignore rengar, like he does every other ad top.
Dont go near bushes and ask for a jungle gank.  he is squish as fck and has no escape
You wait until Riot come to their senses and adjusts him.

gangplank. because you place the barrels and zone him from jumping on you

however. new and old rengar have always been cheesy top lane and near impossible to deal with in levels 1-5. new rengar takes it to new level because of his low Q cd that also resets his auto.

i hate playing against rengar top more than anything. actually. pantheon is my number 1 pain in the ass. rengar top is second.

at level 1 he can easily chunk 60% of your hp with bush hop Q and a cpl autos + tld proc. its ridiculous. his level 3 is absurd. 

here is what you do. sit at your turret. no matter how much cs you lose. don't go near bushes. and don't fight him before level 6

Champion.gg says {{champion:41}}  counters him toplane.
______________________________

But this will all come down to as a battle of skill.
___________________________

Personally I would of thought someone tanky/sustain.. like{{champion:8}} but he isn't even on here..

#Honestly I have no Idea..
Get a Sweeper, Play Caitlyn, Sit back and enjoy your turret's view

{{champion:14}} + stormraiders

at least well die together
Holy shit I never thought of that. Maybe Darius could work with that too.

well it's great on darius for when you get passive stacks and start dunking in a teamfight

but in sion's case it's super cheesy during lanefase where nobody really has any mobility yet because you can get revenge kills so easily because of it

It's more in how you play the lane than who you're playing. Think of yourself as playing against an Orianna. Good Oriannas will zone with her ball, and make it impossible to trade well. When you begin to think of yourself as playing against the ball and not Orianna, the lane comes more naturally since Orianna is dependent on her ball to do anything. 

Think of yourself as playing against the bushes.
